alert.note: Alert for Darlington (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 2:12PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Darlington County through 245 PM EDT... At 212 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Clyde, or 10 miles north of Bishopville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... North Hartsville, Kellytown and Clyde. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
